job.title: SQL Server Database Modernisation Specialist
job.description:
As a Database Modernization Specialist, you will play a crucial role in optimizing our database infrastructure to support enhanced performance, scalability, and reliability. You will lead efforts to rewrite and optimize queries, redesign indexes, and implement a robust maintenance plan to ensure our databases meet the evolving needs of our applications and services. Your expertise will also guide the design and implementation of a change data capture regime to support real-time data processing and analytics.

Key Responsibilities:
•	Manage a production high-volume SQL server in Azure.
•	Conduct thorough assessments of current database structures and queries to identify optimization opportunities.
•	Rewrite and optimize SQL queries and indexes to improve performance and efficiency.
•	Design and implement a regular maintenance plan for database health, including backups, integrity checks, and performance tuning.
•	Develop and integrate a change data capture (CDC) strategy to enable effective data synchronization and real-time analytics.
•	Refactor tables and stored procedures to enhance scalability and maintainability.
•	Collaborate with development teams to ensure seamless integration of database changes into application layers, leveraging Entity Framework (EF) where applicable.
•	Provide guidance and best practices on database design and management to the development team.
•	Stay abreast of the latest trends and technologies in database management and optimization to drive continuous improvement.
•	Write Ad-Hoc Reports: Utilize advanced SQL skills to create ad-hoc reports that support business decisions, demonstrating flexibility and responsiveness to immediate data analysis needs.

Qualifications:
•	Proven experience in database optimization, including query rewriting, index tuning, and performance troubleshooting.
•	Strong understanding of SQL Server or comparable database technologies.
•	Experience with database design principles, including normalization, partitioning, and data warehousing concepts. Knowledge of data warehouse implementation and maintenance is crucial.
•	Familiarity with change data capture (CDC) techniques and tools.
•	Desirable: Experience with Microsoft Fabric, showcasing an ability to work with cutting-edge data warehousing and analytics platforms.
•	Experience with Entity Framework (EF) and .NET development is highly desirable.
•	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a keen attention to detail.
•	Excellent communication and collaboration skills, capable of working effectively in a team environment.

customFields.generatedDescriptionAIv2:
Position: SQL Server Database Modernization Specialist

We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated SQL Server Database Modernization Specialist to join our team. In this role, you will play a crucial part in upgrading our existing database to the latest version. Your responsibilities will include assessing, designing, and implementing necessary changes to enhance performance and ensure maximum security.

Key Responsibilities:
- Evaluate the current database system and identify areas for improvement.
- Design and implement modernization strategies to upgrade the database to the latest version.
- Migrate data from legacy systems to the new database, ensuring accuracy and integrity.
- Optimize SQL queries and improve overall database performance.
- Implement robust security measures to protect sensitive data.
- Collaborate with our team to ensure a smooth transition and seamless integration of the upgraded database.

Requirements:
- Extensive experience working with SQL Server, including database design and performance tuning.
- Proficiency in Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio.
- Strong analytical skills to assess and identify areas for improvement.
- Excellent problem-solving abilities to troubleshoot and resolve database issues.
- Strong understanding of data migration processes and best practices.
- Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and effectively communicate with stakeholders at all levels.

If you are a dedicated SQL Server Database Modernization Specialist with a passion for optimizing database performance and enhancing security, we would love to hear from you. Join our team and make a significant impact on our organization's data infrastructure.
